errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.mobileNumber: Mobile Number must start with 05 and be 10 digits long
errors.passwordPattern: Password must be at least 6 characters, with letters and numbers

login.welcome_message: We’re glad to have you back! Enjoy a simple and secure experience to access everything you need quickly.

signup.sub_welcome: Create your account now and start requesting services easily and quickly.

SLIDER.TITLE: Matloob
SLIDER.HEADING: All Maintenance Services at Your Fingertips
SLIDER.DESCRIPTION: From plumbing and electricity to air conditioning and carpentry, we provide comprehensive solutions with high professionalism and prompt execution tailored to your needs.

CARD_1.TITLE: Fast and Safe Service
CARD_1.DESCRIPTION: We ensure service is delivered quickly and with the highest safety standards, using advanced technologies and precise procedures for your safety and comfort.

CARD_2.TITLE: Certified Professional Technicians
CARD_2.DESCRIPTION: Our team consists of highly experienced and certified technicians, offering professional services that meet the highest performance standards.

CARD_3.TITLE: Transparent and Competitive Prices
CARD_3.DESCRIPTION: We offer fair and competitive prices with no surprises, ensuring full transparency in all invoice details for a trustworthy experience.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Trusted services with the quality you deserve
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: Whatever your maintenance or service needs, our team is ready to serve you with top-level professionalism. Just make a request and we’ll take care of the rest!

SPECIAL_SECTION.TITLE: Exceptional Services for Exceptional Cases
SPECIAL_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_LINE1: When time matters or the request is unique, our premium services offer you an instant solution.
SPECIAL_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_LINE2: From urgent malfunctions that need immediate action to special requests with exceptional details — we serve you efficiently and quickly.

SPECIAL_REQUESTS.TITLE: Special Requests
SPECIAL_REQUESTS.DESCRIPTION: We ensure service delivery with speed and the highest safety standards, using the latest technology and precise procedures to ensure your comfort and safety.

EMERGENCY.TITLE: Emergency Issues
EMERGENCY.DESCRIPTION: Our team is composed of highly experienced and certified technicians who provide professional services with top performance quality.

ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: Our goal is to simplify the customer experience by connecting them with trusted technicians across various specialties such as plumbing, air conditioning, painting, cleaning, and more — all through easy and quick steps. With every request, we aim to deliver a comfortable, safe, and transparent experience from the first click to the completion of the service. We believe your comfort begins with professional service.

HOW_WORK.TITLE: How Do Our Services Work?
HOW_WORK.DESCRIPTION: Start by choosing the service and location, then set the time that suits you. At the scheduled time, our expert technician will arrive to perform the service efficiently and professionally, ensuring you a smooth, hassle-free experience.
HOW_WORK.STEP_2: Select the time that suits you
HOW_WORK.STEP_3: Welcome the technician and enjoy the service

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.DESCRIPTION: We’ve gathered the most common questions that might come to your mind, along with clear answers to help you make the right decision with full confidence. If you don’t find your question here, feel free to contact us directly.

ORDER_NOW.SUBTEXT: Let your comfort begin in less than a minute

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: No matter what your maintenance or service needs are, our team is ready to serve you with the highest level of professionalism. Just place your request and we’ll take care of the rest!

PACKAGE_DETAILS.MEDIA_HINT: Please upload photos showing the service location or the issue type...
PACKAGE_DETAILS.IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Please upload images to explain the service location or issue type to ensure accurate and faster service.

VALIDATION.MIN_DATES: You must select at least {{count}} dates

ABOUT_US_CONTACT.INTRO: A platform specialized in providing professional and high-quality maintenance and home assistance services. Our goal is to simplify our customers' lives by connecting them with qualified and trusted technicians across various fields, through one simple and fast application.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.VISION_DESC: To be the first choice in the region for anyone seeking reliable and fast home services, redefining the maintenance experience through technology, professionalism, and customer trust.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.MISSION_DESC: We are here to provide smart and fast solutions for all your daily needs through integrated services, clear pricing, and a trained team that prioritizes your satisfaction.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.CORE_VALUES_DESC: We believe that quality doesn't happen by chance; it's built on clear and solid principles. In every service we offer, we adhere to our core values that form the foundation of our work.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.WORKS_DESC: Here we present a selection of our projects that reflect our commitment to quality and precision in delivering maintenance and implementation services. Whether in air conditioning, plumbing, painting, or cleaning, we always strive to meet our customers' satisfaction and deliver results worthy of their trust.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.CONTACT_DESC_1: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us. We are here to serve you and provide the support you need.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.CONTACT_DESC_2: We're always ready to answer your inquiries and help you request the right service. Reach out via the form or through available communication methods, and rest assured, we’ll respond promptly.
ABOUT_US_CONTACT.BANNER_DESC: We provide reliable maintenance services with high professionalism and easy ordering. Our goal is to deliver a smooth and fast experience that meets your expectations through an expert team and attentive service.

ORDER_TRACKING.BANNER_DESC: Stay updated with the status of your current orders and latest updates

TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS.INTRO_1: These terms and conditions govern the legal relationship between you and this website operated by the Matloob platform. Please read them carefully before using our website.
TERMS.INTRO_2: Accessing and using our services constitutes your full acceptance of these terms. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and any entity accessing the site or requesting services.
TERMS.INTRO_3: By accessing Matloob and requesting services, you acknowledge and agree to be fully bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of them, you are not permitted to use our services.
TERMS.PURCHASES_DETAILS: When purchasing services on Matloob, you may be required to provide certain information, including but not limited to: payment card number, expiration date, billing address, and shipping information. By confirming the purchase, you agree to:
TERMS.PURCHASES_LI_1: You have the legal right to use the provided payment method.
TERMS.PURCHASES_LI_2: All information you provide is accurate, complete, and current.
TERMS.PURCHASES_LI_3: You allow us to share this information with trusted third parties solely for processing payments.
TERMS.ORDER_CANCELLATION: Matloob reserves the right to cancel any order at any time due to reasons including but not limited to: service unavailability, errors in order details, or unexpected situations.
TERMS.PAYMENT_ACCEPTED: We accept online payments using Visa and Mastercard (credit or debit).
TERMS.REFUND: If eligible for a refund, it will be processed to the original payment method.
TERMS.AVAILABILITY_DESC: While we strive to update our services and offers regularly, errors in pricing, descriptions, or availability may occur. We do not guarantee complete accuracy of the displayed information.
TERMS.PROMOTIONS_DESC: Matloob may occasionally offer promotions like discounts or contests. These are subject to separate terms. If you participate, you agree to all specific rules and our privacy policy.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_DESC: When creating an account, you agree to provide accurate and updated information. You're responsible for securing your password and account activity. Sharing your password is prohibited.
TERMS.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_DESC: All services, content, features, and functionality are the exclusive property of Matloob or its licensors. They are protected by copyright and trademark laws. You may not use our trademarks for marketing without written consent.
TERMS.EXTERNAL_LINKS_DESC: Matloob is not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third-party websites. You are advised to review their terms before interacting or sharing your data.
TERMS.BANNER_DESC: These terms and conditions explain and govern the relationship between you and this website operated by the Matloob platform

PRIVACY.HEADER: At Matloob, your privacy is our responsibility
PRIVACY.PERSONAL_INFO_DESC: Some visitors to the Matloob platform may choose to interact in ways that require collecting personal information...
PRIVACY.SECURITY_DESC: At Matloob, we take your data privacy seriously and use best practices...
PRIVACY.VISITORS_DESC: Like most online service providers, we collect non-personal information sent by browsers...
PRIVACY.ADS_DESC: Ads may appear on our site via advertising partners who may place cookies on your device...
PRIVACY.CHANGES_DESC: We may occasionally update this policy; please review it regularly for changes...
PRIVACY.PROTECTION_DESC: We do not share personal information except with authorized employees and partners...
PRIVACY.PROTECTION_NOTE1: We are committed to protecting users who opted out of data sharing.
PRIVACY.PROTECTION_NOTE2: Some affiliates may be located outside your country. You consent to such transfer.
PRIVACY.EXPOSE1: We do not rent or sell your personal data to third parties.
PRIVACY.EXPOSE2: We may disclose data to comply with legal requests or protect rights.
PRIVACY.EXPOSE3: We may send you email updates regarding new features or services.
PRIVACY.EXPOSE4: We strive to minimize the number of emails sent.
PRIVACY.EXPOSE5: We may publish your inquiry to help others understand or solve similar issues.
PRIVACY.BANNER_DESC: This privacy policy explains how personal information is collected, used, and protected when you use this website operated by the Matloob platform
